config.limitless.title: Limitless Configuration
config.limitless.feature.item_stealing.t: Enables the item stealing feature for collecting equipped items from other players
config.limitless.feature.shulker_box.too: Enables capturing and displaying shulker box contents in creative inventory
config.limitless.feature.glowing.tooltip: Enables the ability to make players and entities glow
Enables floating damage number display when entities take damage
config.limitless.item_stealing.only_play: If enabled, only items from other players will be added to the creative tab
config.limitless.item_stealing.enable_st: Toggles whether items seen from other players are added to the creative tab
config.limitless.combat.players_glow.too: Makes players glow for easier visibility
config.limitless.combat.show_bow_traject: Displays trajectory prediction when aiming with a bow
config.limitless.combat.enable_arrow_dod: Automatically detects incoming arrows and executes evasive movements
config.limitless.combat.show_damage_numb: Displays floating damage numbers above entities when they take damage or heal
config.limitless.combat.damage_font.tool: Changes the font used for damage numbers display
config.limitless.zoom.zoom_level.tooltip: Default zoom magnification level (higher = more zoomed)
config.limitless.zoom.scroll_sensitivity: How much the mouse wheel affects zoom level
